original: kenacit sugatiprāptukāmena heyā daśākuśalakarmapathāḥ prakṛtisāvadyāḥ, tadyathā-
analyzed: kenacid sugati prāptu kāmena heyāḥ daśā akuśala karma pathāḥ prakṛti sāvadyāḥ tat yathā
trividham kāyikam karma vācikam tu caturvidham
mānasam tri prakāram ca daśā ete kuśalāḥ matāḥ

original: ete pravibhāgaśaḥ vyākhyāyante- tatra tāvat kāyikam-prāṇātipātaḥ,
analyzed: ete pravibhāgaśaḥ vyākhyāyante tatra tāvat kāyikam prāṇa atipātaḥ
tatra prāṇa atipātaḥ tu prāṇi bhāvaḥ
prāṇa avarodha bhāvaḥ ca iti etad pañcāṅgaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ bhavati prāṇa atipātaḥ
sthāna cyutiḥ ca etat pañcāṅga saṃyuktam bhavati adatta ādānam
tatra asthānam tu saddharma pratimā ādi bodhisattva sthāna ācārya upādhyāya dakṣiṇīya mātā pitṛ guru ādi saṃnidhiḥ
akāle iti divase ṛtumatī garbhiṇī śiśupoṣiṇībhiḥ anicchā duḥkha daurmanasya pīḍitābhiḥ
adeśaḥ iti mukha varcaḥ mārga tvam
kumāra kanyayoḥ puras pṛṣṭha randhra tvam sva gasta tvam ca
agamyāḥ tu sarvāḥ para striyaḥ dharma dhvaja kula rakṣitāḥ
evam sva bhāryā sevane bhavati kāma mithyā ācāraḥ
tad upāya karaṇam ca iti mithyā vacana uktiḥ ca iti etat pañca aṅga saṃyoge mṛṣāvādaḥ
paiśunyam tu kliṣṭa cittena para bheda kathanam
pāruṣyam iti para marma vedhi dveṣa vacanam
sambhinna pralāpaḥ iti rāga upayukta tvāt āsakti yogāt vā avācyavacanam
abhidhyā iti para dhana dravya aiśvaryeṣu tīvra āsakta citta tā
mithyā dṛṣṭiḥ iti na asti dānam
na su caritam na ca duścaritam
na sukṛta duṣkṛta karmāṇām phala vipākaḥ ca iti
